import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import {House} from 'react-bootstrap-icons' function NavBar() { const[hide, setHide] = useState(true) if(window.screen.availWidth > 768){ setHide(false) } else{ setHide(true) } return (

) } export default NavBar
